Class Regex

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.Regex

  • public class Regex
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides tools to ease regular expressions usage.
    Author:
    Yohan Chalier

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String pattern,
                                     java.lang.String target)
        Applies a pattern to a string.
        Parameters:
        pattern - String of the regular expression to use
        target - String to test the pattern on
        Returns:
        The first match got from applying the pattern to the target, null if none is found.

      • parse

        public static java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String pattern,
                                     java.lang.String target,
                                     int group)
        Applies a pattern to a string
        Parameters:
        pattern - String of the regular expression to use
        target - String to test the pattern on
        group - Index of the group result to retrieves
        Returns:
        The [group]-th match got from applying the pattern to the target, null if none is found.

      • parse

        public static java.lang.String parse(java.lang.String pattern,
                                     java.lang.String target,
                                     int group,
                                     boolean log)
        Applies a pattern to a string
        Parameters:
        pattern - String of the regular expression to use
        target - String to test the pattern on
        group - Index of the group result to retrieves
        log - Enable printing lines giving errors for debug
        Returns:
        The [group]-th match got from applying the pattern to the target, null if none is found.

      • parseAll

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> parseAll(java.lang.String pattern,
                                                        java.lang.String target)
        Applies a pattern to a string and retrieve all matching groups
        Parameters:
        pattern - String of the regular expression to use
        target - String to test the pattern on
        Returns:
        A list of the matchs, or null if none is found.
